overview:
simd_clamp(_:_:_:) Functionsimd_clamp(_:_:_:)func simd_clamp(

    _ min: simd_half16,

# simd_clamp(_:_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

- [ simd_clamp(_:_:_:) ](/documentation/simd/simd_clamp(_:_:_:)-7ck0a)

-  simd_clamp(_:_:_:) 

Function# simd_clamp(_:_:_:)



```
func simd_clamp(
    _ x: simd_half16,
    _ min: simd_half16,
    _ max: simd_half16
) -> simd_half16
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_clamp(_:_:_:)-7ck0a#discussion)

X clamped to the range [min, max].

Note that if you want to clamp all lanes to the same range, you can use a scalar value for min and max.
